author: John Collins
description: Some say the John/Tom Collins was originally made with genever. So is this the original, or an adaptation on the Tom Collins? We will probably never know, but it tastes great.
name: Genever Collins
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice & strain into ice-filled glass
